ComicInfo.Summary: In the past 24 hours, our Green-Skinned Goliath has battled the rampaging Crypto-Man on the streets of Santa Fe, Seen Jarella mortally wounded, and begun a desperate quest across America in search of the man called Doctor Strange! Heaven help anything that gets in his way!
